OOC: I think there are two Autobot Matrix of Leaderships existing in the game. The one brought from the Maximal/Predacon contemporary time into the past held by Rodimus Prime. The other is the one from the game's past setting that is held by the dormant Optimus Prime on the Ark.

Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:                               Cyclonus stood on a lonely outcropping, a jagged ledge hanging over a
 large crater on earth�s moon. In the distance the sun was just
 beginning to show its face over the horizon, its harsh light bringing
 out that strange redness that gave this place its name: the searing
 eye. Moving in the fading darkness, sweeps patrolled the area, looking
 like so many flies on a dead landscape. Cyclonus� powerful frame stood
 resolute and still, his typically foreboding and grim form seemed to
 exude a strange sense of inner peace as the powerful Unicron Herald
 gazed at the vista before him. 
 
 Like some dark raptor Scourge landed next to his commander, for the
 moment breaking the peace and serenity around them. �It is done.�
 Scourge�s voice breaks into Cyclonus� contemplation. �They have
 returned, and it is much as we thought. A few of the cybertronians are
 looking skyward, but for the most part they are squabbling amongst
 themselves.� Scourge held out a data chip to Cyclonus. �As you can see,
 with our forces they will be an easy victory for us.� 
 
 Cyclonus nodded as faced Scourge and took the chip, glancing at the
 information on it.  �Then it is time.� He placed the chip into
 subspace. �Then by Unicron�s command the earth must be made ready for
 assimilation and any bearer of the matrix must be destroyed.  Nothing
 can be allowed to stand in our way!�
 
 Scourge nodded, an eager smile spread across his face. �And nothing
 will. But where shall we go first my lord?�
 
 Cyclonus looked skyward as if his optics could pierce the veil of
 distance between earth and them, silent for a moment. Then he turned
 back to Scourge. �We go to Atlantis.�
 
 Scourge nodded as the duo changed forms, both assuming deadly aerial
 modes. Cyclonus� voice echoed through Minion communication channels.
 �To the air! Minions! Unicronians! The time is NIGH!� 
 
 Cyclonus, Scourge and the sweeps burst into the air, boosters lighting
 up the skies like a second sun, one that quickly fades into the
 distance as the approach their goal.
 
 Next post Earth!
 
 ----------------------------------------------------------
 
 OOC: Any Minion who wants to join, jump on board, just post your way
 in. I am sure as we close in long ranged sensors will pick us up.
 
 Also the lists seem to say that there are two or maybe more Matrixes,
 so if someone could fill me in?
 
 Preston
 (Cyclons/Scourge)
